data.title: Kamal Haasan's arrival in San Diego sets stage for major announcement at Comic-Con
data.meta_description: Scheduled for release on January 12, 2024, 'Project K' aims to captivate audiences across various linguistic regions as it will be presented in Hindi, Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam, Kannada, and English. Alongside his involvement in this ambitious pan-Indian venture, Kamal Haasan is actively involved in the filming of 'Indian 2,' the highly anticipated sequel to the Tamil cult classic 'Indian' released in 1996.
data.text:
Synopsis

Scheduled for release on January 12, 2024, 'Project K' aims to captivate audiences across various linguistic regions as it will be presented in Hindi, Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam, Kannada, and English. Alongside his involvement in this ambitious pan-Indian venture, Kamal Haasan is actively involved in the filming of 'Indian 2,' the highly anticipated sequel to the Tamil cult classic 'Indian' released in 1996.

Renowned actor Kamal Haasan, known for his versatile performances, has made a grand entrance in San Diego, America, where an exciting revelation awaits attendees at Comic-Con. Haasan, set to play a pivotal role in Prabhas's highly anticipated film, 'Project K' directed by Nag Ashwin, arrived in style sporting a casual blue shirt and a cap, exuding an air of readiness for the significant unveiling.

#Budget' 2024 with ET

Union Budget 2024 Live Updates

Budget 2024 Income Tax Slab ChangesLive Updates

'Project K' has already generated immense buzz and is considered one of the most eagerly awaited projects of the year. Boasting of a star-studded cast including Prabhas, Deepika Padukone, Disha Patani, Kamal Haasan, and Amitabh Bachchan, the film has a colossal budget of Rs 600 crore and was initially announced in February 2020.

Scheduled for release on January 12, 2024, 'Project K' aims to captivate audiences across various linguistic regions as it will be presented in Hindi, Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam, Kannada, and English. Alongside his involvement in this ambitious pan-Indian venture, Kamal Haasan is actively involved in the filming of 'Indian 2,' the highly anticipated sequel to the Tamil cult classic 'Indian' released in 1996.

Directed by Shankar, 'Indian 2' features an ensemble cast comprising Kamal Haasan, Kajal Aggarwal, Siddharth, Bobby Simha, Rakul Preet Singh, and Priya Bhavani Shankar, accompanied by the enchanting music of Anirudh Ravichander.

In addition to these exciting projects, Kamal Haasan has a slate of upcoming ventures in the works. Among them is 'KH 233' helmed by director H Vinoth and 'KH 234' directed by the renowned filmmaker Mani Ratnam.

Furthermore, he is set to collaborate with acclaimed directors Pa Ranjith and Lokesh Kanagaraj, showcasing his commitment to working with esteemed talents across the industry. Notably, Kamal Haasan is also immersed in a long-awaited collaboration with director Mahesh Narayanan, for which he is personally penning the script, revealing his multi-faceted talent beyond acting.

As Kamal Haasan sets foot in San Diego, the anticipation surrounding 'Project K' reaches a crescendo, with fans eagerly awaiting the thrilling announcement at Comic-Con. With his dedication to an array of projects in different languages, Kamal Haasan continues to solidify his position as one of the most respected and versatile actors in the Indian film industry.
